# Pesawaran-Ratai

| topo =
| type =
| age =
| volcanic_arc = Sunda Arc

| first_ascent =
| easiest_route =
}}
Pesawaran-Ratai is a  Quaternary stratovolcano in Lampung, southern Sumatra, Indonesia. The volcano features a crater breached to the north representing a sector collapse. Along the southern slopes, there are geysers and hot springs.
See also
* List of volcanoes in Indonesia
